EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_PCF & vCloudAir_Q414.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us: Application Delivery with Pivotal CF & vCloudAir Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/10x-improvement-in-server-to-admin-ratios> Companies across all industries are innovating with software to stay competitive, connect with customers, grow new revenue sources, and transform their business. As an IT operations or applications leader, you are tasked with finding ways to deliver applications in weeks, not months. Attend this Webinar to learn how you can accelerate software delivery with VMware vSphere or vCloud Air and Pivotal CF.
During the webinar <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/10x-improvement-in-server-to-admin-ratios> you will hear from both VMware and Pivotal experts on how you can simultaneously improve both developer and operational efficiency.
REGISTER NOW >> <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/10x-improvement-in-server-to-admin-ratios> SUPERCHARGE APP DELIVERY TUESDAY OCT 28, 2014 10AM PDT REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/10x-improvement-in-server-to-admin-ratios>
